caption.title: Lineages-through-time (LTT) plot for the maximum likelihood phylogeny reconstructed from a real HIV-1 pol sequence data set [ 38].
caption.p: The depth ( x-axis) corresponds to the distance of internal nodes from the root in branch length units (expected number of nucleotide substitutions). The y-axis corresponding to the number of lineages is log-transformed to emphasize the location of an exponential period of growth.
Click here for additional data file.
